vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀβιά (Heb. אֲבִיָּה, אֲבִיָּהוּ), ὁ, indecl. (in FlJ, Ἀβίας, -α),
Abia, Abijah.
__1. Son of Rehoboam (3Ki.14:1): Mat.1:7.
__2. A priest of the line of Eleazar (1Ch.24:3, 10): Luk.1:5.
† (From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.14.31;
son of: Rehoboam (H7346) and Maacah (H4601K);
brother of: Attai (H6262I), Ziza (H2124H) and Shelomith (H8019);
father of: Asa (H0609);
half-brother of: Jeush (H3266K), Shemariah (H8114H) and Zaham (H2093); also called Abijam (KJV: Abia) at 1Ki.14.31; 15.1,7,8;
§ Abijah, "[my] father is Yahweh"
Abiajah, (Proper name), indecl. Hebrew is Abijah. (1) the son of Rehoboam (1Chr. 3:10) Mt. 1:7; (2) the division of priests to which Zechariah belonged (1Chr. 24:10) Lk. 1:5*
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Abías (1) persona en la genealogía de Jesús (MAT.1:7); (2) fundador de una tribu de sacerdotes (LUC.1:5)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我父是雅威 (耶和華)"
1)一個祭司, 祭司家族的領袖同著大衛將祭司分為二十四班次，
亞比雅是第八班。路加福音的撒迦利亞即屬於該班次 (路 1:5)
2)猶大王羅波安的兒子與繼承者 (太 1:7)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚比雅这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"我父是雅威(耶和华)"
1)一个祭司, 祭司家族的领袖同着大卫将祭司分为二十四班次，
亚比雅是第八班。路加福音的撒迦利亚即属于该班次 (路 1:5)
2)犹大王罗波安的儿子与继承者 (太 1:7)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: A-bi-gia « Cha của sự vui vẻ » // H29

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.10
§ Abijah, "[my] father is Yahweh"
Abiajah, (Proper name), indecl. Hebrew is Abijah. (1) the son of Rehoboam (1Chr. 3:10) Mt. 1:7; (2) the division of priests to which Zechariah belonged (1Chr. 24:10) Lk. 1:5*
